p: These biologically active compounds are directly accountable for antioxidant, antimicrobial, antifungal, and anticancer activities [ 57]. Tannins for example encourage wound healing process by chelating of free radical or reactive oxygen species, shrinking of proteins, promoting wound contraction, increasing capillary vessels and fibroblasts formation [ 58, 59]. Besides; phenolic compounds act as antimicrobials, antioxidants, and anti-inflammatory [ 60]. Restrain the reactive species produced by phagocytic cells is also important in wound healing process [ 61].
